thread.title: Beach House Share She's So Lovely, One Thing, and Majorette
thread.title_full: Beach House Share She's So Lovely, One Thing, and Majorette - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Beach House Share She's So Lovely, One Thing, and Majorette
text:
Photo by Shawn Brackbill
Last week, Beach House announced Thank Your Lucky Stars, their follow-up to August's Depression Cherry that's out this Friday. As they did with cuts from Depression Cherry, the band's website is streaming several cuts from Thank Your Lucky Stars through a "Single Finder" function. To hear the new tracks, pick your three favorite Beach House songs to date. The website will play "She's So Lovely", "One Thing", or "Majorette", based on the songs you select.
Beach House also have the "Setlist Creator" section of their website, which allows fans to influence setlists by making three special requests.
Read our feature on Beach House.
Watch Forever Still, Pitchfork.tv's short film featuring 4 performances from the band: Â»
